# Keywords blacklist for "php-spam-filter"
# Any regular expression syntax can be used here
# 	(without the delimiters)
# All keywords are case insensitive.
# Lines starting with '#' are ignored.

(these people are|they are|this|is|is a|are|you|have|they|money|bring|back)\s*(scam)|(spam)|(thief)|(stole)|(steal)|(is gone)
ponzi
god will
punish
destroy
thunder
fire
scatter you
you are mad
una dey mad
una dey craze
una go craze
una go mad
doing press up
doing pressup
